data.message: im glad i got to see him at the anger management tour in like 06'... right before he cancelled the tour too. ahhh! so glad you made it back and the way your crushing emcees is great.

replies.message: Likewise homie. back in July of 2005, the anger management tour III came down to South Texas.... Waayy before he cancelled the rest of the shows. Lol FUCKING AMAZING! Saw him again in 2014 at ACL! Different kind of energy nowadays, but damn.. I cried of joy at both!!
